item.title: Configuration Manager ADR 0x80070194 Helper Script
item.description:
The Cloud file provider exited unexpectedly

404 Error – .cab File Missing

Occasionally this error appears when attempting to deploy updates: 0x80070194

This is usually the result of a missing .cab file. If the CAB file doesn’t exist, you will be unable to download and deploy that specific update(s) where the CAB file is deleted.

For more details, Patch My PC provides an overview of the issue:
https://patchmypc.com/kb/adr-error-0x87d20417/

To resolve the problem manually, follow the steps here:
https://patchmypc.com/kb/missing-cab-update/
